title: Science-Themed Chinese Speaking Project: AI and Collaborative Learning Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment for general citizens interested in science to improve Mandarin communication skills, incorporating AI tools and peer feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can select a science-related topic (e.g., climate change, recycling) and write a 5-minute spoken script without AI tool support
Learners can critically evaluate AI-generated content and revise over 70% of it into context-appropriate expressions
Learners can orally reproduce AI-generated presentations in real-life scenarios with over 80% accuracy by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
